description: A real-time evaluation and monitoring platform for easy management of different events and reports to work in four hierarchical user-views to cater the requirements of Indian Council of Cultural Relations (ICCR)
name: Sangmanch

description: A multi-user platform to track the supply chain of Prescription Based drugs from manufacturer to the end-user to prevent untracked sales and black marketing.
name: DAAS (Drug Analytics & Alerting System)

description: Real World Social Website with all features like creating a post, likes, comments, User Signup/Login, User Profile Edit.
name: CodeSocials

description: Web application showcasing uploaded image species with ML predictions (RESNET-50) stored in database with CRUD operations.
name: RESNET Classifier

description: Website accessing data on covid-19 across the globe. Live tracking done by the COVID-19 API
name: Live COVID-19 Tracker

description: Platform made to access the images sent from the Mars Rover datewise. Used Mars Rover Photos API by NASA.
name: MAIR
